FuncDef: This command configures the down-link bitrate in kb/s to be used in the GTP messages.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the downlink Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) to be used in the GTP messages as QOS IE (GTPv1) or Bearer QOS (GTPv2).
Specifies the downlink Maximum Bit Rate (MBR) to be used in the GTP messages as QOS IE (GTPv1) or Bearer QOS (GTPv2).

ExtraInfo: Default: down-link gbr 2000 mbr 2000down-link gbr 2000 mbr 2000 	 - for ggsndown-link gbr 0 mbr 0   	- for mme and pgw
